channel.description: Recent content in Java on Robin's blog

item.title: Batch operations using composite keys in postgres over jdbc
item.description: Throughout a career as a software developer, you encounter many patterns. Some appear just often enough to remember that they exist, but you still need to look them up every time. I’ve discovered that writing things down helps me remember them more easily. This particular pattern is very useful for my current project. So, it’s time to write it down and hopefully commit it to memory properly this time. Although this post is specific to PostgreSQL, I’m sure other databases have the necessary features to achieve the same results efficiently.
